statements: SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id = 1;
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE trip_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT traveler_id, trip_date, destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT traveler_name, destination, trip_date FROM solo_travelers ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE traveler_name = 'Alice'
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE trip_date = '2022-12-25'
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travelers WHERE destination LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY trip_date DESC
SELECT traveler_name, destination, trip_date FROM solo_travelers WHERE destination = 'Paris' OR destination = 'Rome' ORDER BY traveler_name ASC, trip_date DESC
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, destination, trip_date FROM solo_travelers ORDER BY trip_date ASC, traveler_name DESC
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT username, location FROM solo_travelers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, username, location FROM solo_travelers ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, interests FROM solo_travelers WHERE location='Japan' AND age < 40;
SELECT traveler_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trip_plans WHERE group_size >= 3 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT id, username, location FROM solo_travelers WHERE interests LIKE '%Adventure%';
SELECT traveler_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trip_plans WHERE group_size > 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT username, age FROM solo_travelers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND location = 'Europe';
SELECT t.destination, t.start_date, t.end_date, s.username FROM trip_plans t JOIN solo_travelers s ON t.traveler_id = s.id WHERE t.group_size = 2 ORDER BY t.start_date ASC;

SELECT traveler_id, full_name, age, location FROM solo_travelers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trip_name, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT name, age FROM solo_travelers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM trips ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = receiver_id;

SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM SoloTravelers;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_country FROM SoloTravelers WHERE traveler_country = 'USA';

SELECT traveler_name, trip_destination FROM SoloTravelers JOIN Connections ON SoloTravelers.traveler_id = Connections.traveler_id JOIN GroupTrips ON Connections.connection_id = GroupTrips.connection_id JOIN Trips ON GroupTrips.trip_id = Trips.trip_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM Messages ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoloTravelers;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_country FROM SoloTravelers WHERE traveler_country='USA';

SELECT traveler_name, trip_destination FROM SoloTravelers JOIN Connections ON SoloTravelers.traveler_id = Connections.traveler_id JOIN GroupTrips ON Connections.connection_id = GroupTrips.connection_id JOIN Trips ON GroupTrips.trip_id = Trips.trip_id;
SELECT trip_name, trip_destination, connection_date FROM Trips JOIN GroupTrips ON Trips.trip_id = GroupTrips.trip_id JOIN Connections ON GroupTrips.connection_id = Connections.connection_id;
SELECT traveler_name, message_text FROM SoloTravelers JOIN Messages ON SoloTravelers.traveler_id = Messages.sender_id;
